import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RegistrationService } from '../registration.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user', templateUrl: './user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user.component.css'] }) export class UserComponent { constructor(private api:RegistrationService){} logout():void { this.api.logout(); } }
